resources.string: In order to assist you with calling feature, Contact Util needs your permission to access your contacts.
In order to assist you with calling feature, Contact Util needs your permission to access your contacts.
Select contact to get popup for call alert.
Now you can set call alert for your chosen numbers with ease. Provide overlay permission to get alert window while incoming call
To show caller dialog when app is closed we need autostart permission!
1. This app only works when app is in foreground.
2. App will show popup like view, when a call is incoming from selected contact
